prompt: <description>Part 1 Create the base of the prism Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The length of the sides is twice the height of the prism. The height of the prism is one-third of the length of the sides. Create the first cylinder sketch with the following circle: - Center: [0.0075, 0.0075] - Radius: 0.0075 Create a second cylinder sketch with the following circle: - Center: [0.0825, 0.0075] - Radius: 0.0075 3. **Extrude the sketches to create the cylinders and cut the voids** Extrude both sketches along the Z-axis with the following properties: - Extrude Depth towards normal (Z-axis): 0.0 - Extrude Depth opposite normal (Z-axis): 0.0375 - Sketch Scale: 0.09 Perform a boolean CutFeatureOperation to create the desired cylindrical voids in the prism's upper part.
